attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sunderland authority propose to close Gillas Lane Primary School and move all the children to Bernard Gilpin. While Bernard Gilpin is a very good school we feel the upheaval and larger class sizes will be detrimental to the well being and education of the children in both schools. We ask instead that the PAN for each school be reduced.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "listen to the voice of the people in Houghton-le-Spring and keep Gillas Lane Primary School open."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
